verses.verse: וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <WH7760> laid הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king [אֲחַשֵׁרֹשׁ כ] (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹ֧ושׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus ק) מַ֛ס <WH4522> a tribute עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon the land וְאִיֵּ֥י <WH339> and [upon] the isles הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> And all the acts תָקְפּוֹ֙ <WH8633> of his power וּגְב֣וּרָת֔וֹ <WH1369> and of his might וּפָרָשַׁת֙ <WH6575> and the declaration גְּדֻלַּ֣ת <WH1420> of the greatness מָרְדֳּכַ֔י <WH4782> of Mordecai אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to which גִּדְּל֖וֹ <WH1431> advanced הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> whereunto the king הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> him [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> act הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> of the kings מָדַ֥י <WH4074> of Media וּפָרָֽס׃ <WH6539> Persia

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> For מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <WH4782> For Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֗י <WH3064> the Jew מִשְׁנֶה֙ <WH4932> [was] next לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus וְגָדוֹל֙ <WH1419> and great לַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> among the Jews וְרָצ֖וּי <WH7521> and accepted לְרֹ֣ב <WH7230> of the multitude אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> of his brethren דֹּרֵ֥שׁ <WH1875> seeking טוֹב֙ <WH2896> the wealth לְעַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> of his people וְדֹבֵ֥ר <WH1696> and speaking שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace לְכָל־ <WH3605> of his whole זַרְעֽוֹ׃ <WH2233> to all his seed
